mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (userID, userNickName, userPassWord, userEmail, userEmailCheck, userThumbImg, userCategory, userIntro) VALUES (#{userID}, #{userNickName}, #{userPassWord}, #{userEmail}, #{userEmailCheck}, #{userThumbImg}, #{userCategory}, #{userIntro})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user where userID = #{userID} and userPassWord = #{userPassWord}
SELECT count(*) FROM user where userID = #{userID}
SELECT count(*) FROM user where userNickName = #{userNickName}
